The NAZI SOLDIER looking through the periscope pulls away from it, smiles, then turns back to it.

dialogue.name: THROUGH THE PERISCOPE
dialogue.s: INDY's face, still pressed against the lens.

meta.s: VOGEL pulls INDY from the periscope.
The NAZI SOLDIER pulls away from the periscope again.
INDY now lies on top of VOGEL.
He kicks out at the periscope which spins around.
The periscope handle spins around and hits the PERISCOPE SOLDIER in the head.
He falls against the NAZI SOLDIER guarding HENRY and BRODY.
HENRY pushes the NAZI SOLDIER aside and grabs the gun.
The PERISCOPE SOLDIER struggles to take the gun from Henry.
VOGEL holds the chain around INDY's neck, pushing his head downward toward the revolving tread.
The PERISCOPE SOLDIER holds HENRY from behind, forcing the gun toward him.
Henry reaches down and pulls a fountain pen from his coat pocket.

dialogue.name: CONTINUED:
dialogue.s: As the PERISCOPE SOLDIER pulls on HENRY's face, Henry lifts the fountain pen and squirts ink into his face.
The Soldier falls, his head smashing into the wall of the tank.
At the same time, Henry loses his grip on the gun which falls to the floor.

dialogue.name: BRODY
dialogue.s: The pen is mightier than the sword.

meta.s: A troop truck pulls near the tank.
HENRY fires the TANK GUN at the troop truck.
SOLDIERS FLY INTO THE AIR.
The TROOP TRUCK flips over and EXPLODES.
The EXPLOSION knocks INDY off the tank and onto the tread.
He grabs onto the shredded gun protruding from the side of the tank.
VOGEL looks down at INDY and smiles smugly.
The tank is approaching a cliff wall.
As INDY tries to secure footing, VOGEL steps on his hands.
BRODY looks at HENRY.
VOGEL now swings a shovel at INDY, smashing at his hands.
BRODY climbs up out of the tank, followed by HENRY.
CONTINUED:

dialogue.name: HENRY
dialogue.s: Didn't I tell you it was a rescue, huh?

meta.s: A NAZI SOLDIER appears and pulls HENRY down.
VOGEL raises the shovel above his head and brings it crashing down on INDY, still hanging from the protruding gun.
INDY loses his grip and now hangs from the gun suspended only by the strap of his leather pouch.
He screams as the gun scrapes against the cliff wall, sending stones tumbling down over him.
The NAZI SOLDIER knocks HENRY into a pile of boxes, then punches him in the face.
As the SOLDIER raises the gun to HENRY's face, BRODY hits him over the head with a canister.
The Soldier falls, discharging the gun into the air.
The BULLET RICOCHETS around the tank, past the Tank Driver who is manipulating levers at the control panel.
SPARKS FLY; then the BULLET PINGS AGAINST THE WINDOW and RICOCHETS ONCE MORE, this time passing THROUGH THE TANK DRIVER'S HAT.
Blood flows from under the hat as the Tank Driver slumps forward, his body depressing the levers.
INDY still hangs from the strap of his leather pouch as the tank swerves, barely missing the rocks and causing VOGEL to fall.
Indy finally manages to pull himself atop the tank once more where he punches Vogel over the side, then peers down to HENRY, still inside the tank.
INDY pulls HENRY and BRODY from the tank.
VOGEL pulls himself back atop the tank armed again with the shovel which he swings at Indy, who ducks and grabs Vogel's arm.

dialogue.name: BRODY
dialogue.s: How does one get off this thing?

meta.s: As INDY winds up to punch VOGEL he catches BRODY in the face on the backswing, then completes the movement and knocks Vogel down.
Vogel's hat sails in and falls to the floor.
Before INDY can answer, VOGEL is up and swinging with the shovel.
Indy ducks but the shovel catches HENRY sending him over the side and onto the moving tread.
INDY grabs his whip, knocking VOGEL aside.
As HENRY speeds toward the front of the tank to certain doom, INDY, with lightning speed, whips out his bullwhip, wrapping the end of the whip around Henry's right ankle.
HENRY is bouncing across the treads like a rag-doll.
INDY struggles to hold onto the end of the bullwhip.
SALLAH draws his horse next to the treads.
He tips his fez to HENEY.

dialogue.name: SALLAH
dialogue.s: Father of Indy and give me your hand!

meta.s: VOGEL now punches INDY in the back and grabs him around the neck.
Still, INDY refuses to let go of the whip.
SALLAH reaches out to HENRY.
SALLAH manages to hold onto HENRY as he brings his horse to a stop just at the cliff's edge.
INDY finally frees himself of VOGEL's grasp, twisting his arm painfully away from Indy's neck, then landing a hard blow to Vogel's head.

dialogue.name: INDY
dialogue.s: looks down at the fast-approaching cliff, his face filled with horror.
We SEE his HAT BLOW OFF and sail over the cliff's edge.

dialogue.name: VOGEL
dialogue.s: He sees his life passing before him, he screams at the top of his lungs!

dialogue.name: LONG SHOT
dialogue.s: The tank trundles over the cliff and PLUMMETS TO THE BOTTOM.

meta.s: HENRY, BRODY and SALLAH look down at the flaming wreckage of the tank.
We HEAR the TANK EXPLODING.

dialogue.name: HENRY
dialogue.s: And I never told him anything.
Five minutes would have been enough.

meta.s: And then... looking dazed and bewildered, INDY STAGGERS UP BEHIND THEM.
He joins the others at the edge of the cliff, looking down at the wreckage below with a bewildered expression.
Finally, Henry becomes aware of his presence.
HENRY says nothing.
He just looks at Indy, overcome with emotion.
Finally, he throws his arms around him.

dialogue.name: HENRY
dialogue.s: I thought I'd lost you, boy.

meta.s: After a moment, Indy's head clears.
And he becomes aware of his father's embrace.
Something he hasn't felt in a long time and if ever.
And it touches him.
He hugs his father back.

dialogue.name: INDY
dialogue.s: I thought you had too, sir.

meta.s: BRODY and SALLAH are moved by this sudden reconciliation.
HENRY pats INDY on the back and Indy collapses, sitting hard on the rocky cliff edge.

dialogue.name: CONTINUED:
dialogue.s: Unaware, HENRY, SALLAH and BRODY start to walk away.
Henry turns back to see INDY still sitting on the ground.

dialogue.name: HENRY
dialogue.s: why are you sitting there resting when we're so near the end?

meta.s: HENRY turns and walks toward the horse with BRODY and SALLAH.
Suddenly the FEDORA, borne on the wind, BLOWS INTO SCENE and lands at INDY's feet.
DONOVAN peers through binoculars to see the CANYON OF THE CRESCENT MOON.
He lowers the binoculars and turns to ELSA.

dialogue.name: DONOVAN
dialogue.s: The Canyon of the Crescent Moon.

INDY, HENRY, SALLAH and BRODY ride into the canyon.
They hear a WAILING WIND.
Feel the biting cold.
And sense the danger.

It is a stunning sight.
The vehicles, camels and horses belonging to DONOVAN's party have been left at the entrance.
INDY, SALLAH, HENRY AND BRODY creep forward to see:

dialogue.name: THE TERRIFIED FACE OF A TURKISH SOLDIER
dialogue.s: Muttering a prayer under his breath.

dialogue.name: FULL SHOT - INSIDE THE MOUNTAIN TEMPLE

GIANT COLUMNS define the Temple's perimeter.

dialogue.name: ELSA AND DONOVAN
dialogue.s: watch him from a safe distance.

dialogue.name: THE TURK
dialogue.s: is about to approach the spot where a TURKISH SOLDIER LIES DEAD.
We don't notice it right away, but the dead soldier has been DECAPITATED.

meta.s: THE TURK stops and only one step away from the beheaded soldier.

dialogue.name: THE TURK
dialogue.s: takes one more step and a fatal step, it turns out.
We hear a ROAR and A WHOOSH of air and but we SEE NOTHING and except THE TURK'S HEAD FLY OFF AND BOUNCE across the ground.

meta.s: TWO NAZI SOLDIERS force another Turk forward.
Suddenly...
The SOUND OF RIFLE BOLTS being cocked.
Everyone turns to discover INDY and his party surrounded by NAZI SOLDIERS.
Indy's group are relieved of their guns.

dialogue.name: FULL SHOT - THE TEMPLE
dialogue.s: INDY, HENRY, BRODY and SALLAH are brought forward by the Nazi Soldiers.

meta.s: ELSA's eyes light up: glad Indy's not dead.
she controls herself and continues more coldly.

dialogue.name: ELSA
dialogue.s: (to INDY) I never expected to see you again.

dialogue.name: DONOVAN
dialogue.s: He's going to recover the Grail for us.

dialogue.name: DONOVAN
dialogue.s: Ready to go down in history?

dialogue.name: DONOVAN
dialogue.s: ! and Is that the limit of your vision?!
The Nazis want to write themselves into the Grail legend and take on the world.
But I want the Grail itself.
The cup that gives everlasting life.
Hitler can have the world, but he can't take it with him.
I'm going to be drinking my own health when he's gone the way of the Dodo.
(he draws his pistol) The Grail is mine, and you're going to get it for me.

dialogue.name: INDY
dialogue.s: Shooting me won't get you anywhere.

The bullet enters his side below the ribs.
HENRY collapses.
Blood flowing from the wound.
BRODY and SALLAH rush to his assistance.
CONTINUED: (2) INDY spins toward DONOVAN with murder in his eyes.
DONOVAN points the gun at him:

dialogue.name: DONOVAN
dialogue.s: You can't save him when you're dead.

meta.s: INDY hesitates.

dialogue.name: DONOVAN
dialogue.s: The healing power of the Grail is the only thing that can save your father now.
It's time to ask yourself what you believe.

meta.s: INDY takes in the situation.
The two decapitated men lie a few yards in front of him.
He walks to the entranceway, flanked by two stone lions.
We get silent reaction shots and ELSA and SALLAH and BRODY and DONOVAN and registering their different emotions INDY proceeds forward.
His hands open the Grail Diary.

dialogue.name: INDY
dialogue.s: "The Breath of God... Only the penitent man will pass.
Only the penitent man will pass.

meta.s: INDY takes a few steps forward.
INDY stops.
He is about to reach the spot where two men have just died.
HENRY looks at INDY.
Indy looks at Henry.

dialogue.name: HENRY
dialogue.s: (in a raspy voice) "Only the penitent man will pass.
Only the penitent man will pass."

dialogue.name: INDY
dialogue.s: (quietly to himself) The penitent man will pass.

meta.s: INDY takes a step forward through the cobwebs.
CONTINUED: (3)

dialogue.name: INDY
dialogue.s: The penitent man is humble before God.

meta.s: The cobwebs begin to move....
We hear the awful rush of air and WHOOSH!
Because INDY is in the act of kneeling, only his hat is knocked off and his hair flies in his face.
Instinctively he ROLLS FORWARD on the ground out of harm's way and looks up.
From his new position he is able to see what is causing all the trouble: A RAZOR SHARP TRIPLE PENDULUM.
INDY gets cautiously to his feet.
Now he sees the pendulum has been guarding a SMALL CORRIDOR which turns a corner to the left fifty yards ahead.
Wooden wheels turn and the mechanism controlling the spinning blades.

ELSA AND DONOVAN
BRODY and SALLAH smile, relieved.
HENRY shakes his head.
holding the Grail Diary, reading once again, his fedora now covered in cobwebs.

dialogue.name: INDY
dialogue.s: "The second challenge is the Word of God.

dialogue.name: INDY
dialogue.s: "Proceed in the footsteps of the Word."

meta.s: as he studies the cobblestones before him.

dialogue.name: HENRY

who grunts as he pulls himself from the hole, the v-rail Diary in his hand.

DONOVAN and ELSA follow in his footsteps.
INDY sighs with relief and steps forward to:

dialogue.name: THE GREAT ABYSS
dialogue.s: INDY stands in a small opening, just small enough for his shoulders to squeeze through and beyond that a 100 foot drop to the rocks below and 100 feet across, nothing but a rough, stony cliff wall.

meta.s: He can see nowhere to cross.
He looks again to the v-rail Diary.

dialogue.name: INDY
dialogue.s: Only in the leap from the lion's head will he prove his worth."

meta.s: INDY looks around and then he notices that inscribed into the rock above his head is the head of a lion.
INDY looks down into the Diary and tortures over what it is asking him to do.

dialogue.name: BRODY
dialogue.s: rushes forward and calls to INDY.

meta.s: We see him do it.
We see him leap into space.
We see that he is in midair.
We see that he is not going to make it.
His hands claw for the opposite wall but he is going to fall 100 feet to his death.
And then and he doesn't!
He appears to be held up by thin air as he lands on his hands and knees.
INDY looks around and down and now he figures it out.
Ingeniously, the First Crusaders have painted a pathway to align with the rocks 100 feet below.
It is a perfect forced perspective image of the rocks below with lines from a hundred feet continuing six feet below his sight line where his feet are stepping.
It's painted to blend in with the rocks below.
Highly evolved camouflage... in perfect alignment with everything we see below.
When INDY leans out to the left or right... that's when he sees the perfect alignment shift that betrays the trick.
Indy throws some dirt on the bridge and he crosses it like the first Crusader from the painting over Henry's desk.
Indy crawls through a small opening in the side of the cliff and enters a Temple.

Many sizes, many shapes, some gold, some silver, but they all glitter and shine.
INDY is mesmerized by their number and their beauty.
And then he realizes that a man is praying at the altarl He has his back turned to INDY... but he is dressed as what he is!
A GRAIL KNIGHT.

scene.sceneheader: INT. CLOSE ON THE GRAIL KNIGHT

dialogue.name: KNIGHT
dialogue.s: I knew you'd come, but my strength has left me.

dialogue.name: KNIGHT
dialogue.s: The last of three brothers who swore an oath to find the Grail and to guard it.

dialogue.name: INDY
dialogue.s: That was seven hundred years ago.

meta.s: The GRAIL KNIGHT reaches forward and fingers Indy's clothing.

dialogue.name: KNIGHT
dialogue.s: I was chosen because I was the bravest and the most worthy.
The honor was mine until another came to challenge me to single combat.
I pass it to you who vanquished me.

meta.s: The GRAIL KNIGHT holds his sword out to INDY.

dialogue.name: INDY
dialogue.s: (gulp) Listen, I don't have time to explain, but and

meta.s: At that moment DONOVAN and ELSA appear.
Donovan turns to face the display of cups.

dialogue.name: KNIGHT
dialogue.s: For as the True Grail will bring you life and the False Grail will take it from you.

dialogue.name: DONOVAN
dialogue.s: I have no idea what it looks like.

meta.s: ELSA and INDY exchange looks.
He thinks he is seeing her in her true colors.
ELSA chooses a cup and a solid gold, emerald encrusted goblet.
DONOVAN instantly takes it from her.

dialogue.name: DONOVAN
dialogue.s: It's more beautiful than I'd ever imagined.
This certainly is the cup of the King of Kings.

meta.s: DONOVAN rushes to the well and fills the goblet with water.
DONOVAN drinks from the goblet.
Then, DONOVAN'S entire body starts to convulse.
His face contorts in agony.
He grabs his stomach and turns toward ELSA.
He starts to age and fast!
His hair grows long and gray and brittle.
His face sinks.
Fingernails curl back on themselves.
Milky cataracts coat his eyes.
ELSA gasps and screams.
His skin turns brown and leathery and stretches across his bones until it splits.
His skeletal hands reach for ELSA's throat, choking her.
INDY rushes forward and pushes DONOVAN away.
As he falls he BODY BREAKS INTO FLAMES, then SHATTERS AGAINST THE WALL.
INDY studies the array of chalices.

dialogue.name: ELSA
dialogue.s: It would not be made out of gold.

meta.s: INDY picks up another cup and a simple earthenware jug.

dialogue.name: INDY
dialogue.s: That's the cup of a carpenter.

meta.s: He and ELSA exchange a look.

dialogue.name: INDY
dialogue.s: There's only one way to find out.

INDY brings the jug to his lips and takes several large swallows.
A strange sensation overcomes him, a feeling of peace and contentment...and we see his wounds begin to heal.

dialogue.name: KNIGHT
dialogue.s: But the Grail cannot pass beyond the Great Seal.
That is the boundary and the price of immortality.

scene.sceneheader: INT. BACK TO TO BRODY AND SALLAH who attend to Henry awaiting Indy's return.

The TWO NAZI SOLDIERS are over-awed by the possessors of the Grail.

HENRY's eyes open.

dialogue.name: NAZI SOLDIERS
dialogue.s: SALLAH points a rifle at them.

dialogue.name: ELSA

dialogue.name: INDY
dialogue.s: The Knight warned us not to take the Grail from here.

dialogue.name: HENRY
dialogue.s: Junior, give me your other hand!

dialogue.name: INDY
dialogue.s: I can get it and I can almost reach it, Dad.

INDY snaps his look up to his father.

INDY abandons the Grail and grabs onto HENRY with both hands.
HENRY pulls him up to safety.

dialogue.name: THE GRAIL KNIGHT

INDY and HENRY down the passageway just as a huge stone column tumbles down upon the spot where they stood.
